definition: the beginning of Spring/the 10 or 20 days following the lunar New Year's Day
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: May the joy of the Sping Festival be with you throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 願新春佳節的喜悅，伴隨您度過新的一年。

sentences.english: The lion dance is one of the oldest traditions to celebrate the Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 舞獅子是另一項慶祝新春的古老習俗。

sentences.english: May the New Year bring you health, happiness and all other good things.
sentences.chinese: 祝您新春快樂，身體健康，萬事如意。

sentences.english: Lantern Festival is generally considered the last day of the Chinese Lunar New Year.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節一般被認爲是中國新春佳節的最後一天。

sentences.english: Mr. Li Tieying, new President of Toy Shan Association, extended his holiday greetings to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 台山同鄉會新任會長李鐵英向來賓致以新春問候。

sentences.english: The Spring Festival, north Korea's women wear new.
sentences.chinese: 新春佳節，朝鮮的婦女穿戴一新。

sentences.english: Everything that the sever winter takes, early spring will give you return.
sentences.chinese: 嚴冬掠去的一切，新春會給你還來。

sentences.english: On the occasion of the Spring Festival, good business.
sentences.chinese: 值此新春佳節之際，恭祝事業蒸蒸日上。

sentences.english: According to Chinese tradition, the Lantern Festival is the last day of the Chinese New Year celebration.
sentences.chinese: 從中國民俗來說，元宵節是中國新春佳節的收尾。

sentences.english: Year of the Rabbit gets Sydney hopping.
sentences.chinese: 海外華人迎新春，悉尼同胞慶兔年。

sentences.english: Chinese Lunar New Year Celebration Performance.
sentences.chinese: 學校學務虎年新春晚會。

sentences.english: WE. Pepsi. HoTLiPs:I wish all our Chinese fans a very happy New Year and a nice holiday.
sentences.chinese: 祝願所有的中國粉絲新春快樂，假期愉快。

sentences.english: Overture of Spring Festival is a very famous piece of Chinese instrumental m…
sentences.chinese: 春節序曲是李喚之作曲的著名賀新春樂曲。

sentences.english: Welcome to the New Year's Concert.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎各位出席民政事務局庚寅年新春酒會。

sentences.english: Last day to turn in Chinese Lunar New Year posters.
sentences.chinese: 學校學務虎年新春海報比賽截止收件。

sentences.english: First day to turn in Chinese Lunar New Year posters.
sentences.chinese: 學校學務虎年新春海報比賽開始收件。

definition: Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
(in the spring) nature takes on a new look (idiom)
